targets.query: SELECT count("controller") FROM "rails" WHERE ("hook" = 'process_action' AND "status" != '200' AND "status" != '302' AND "status" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($per)
SELECT count("controller") FROM "rails" WHERE ("hook" = 'process_action' AND "status" = '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($per)

panels.description: Time spent in executing database queries
panels.title: Database Query Performance

targets.query: SELECT percentile("view", 50) FROM "rails" WHERE ("hook" = 'process_action') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
